TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IdnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 支援在網際網路網域名稱中使用非 ASCII 字元。

span.span: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網際網路網域名稱是由一或多個部分，呼叫以標籤分隔符號分隔的網域名稱標籤所組成。An Internet domain name consists of one or more parts, called domain name labels, separated by label separators. 例如，網域名稱"www.proseware.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"有關 proseware"和"com"，以句點分隔。For example, the domain name "www.proseware.com" consists of the labels, "www", "proseware", and "com", separated by periods. 標準的網域名稱是由 US-ASCII （或基本拉丁文） 字元範圍，從 007E u+0000 到 U + 0021 中的指定字元所組成。Standard domain names consist of designated characters in the US-ASCII (or Basic Latin) character range, from U+0021 to U+007E. 若要以便在不使用 US-ASCII 字元集，國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA) 的文化特性的網際網路使用標準已採用的 2003，以支援包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元的方式。To facilitate Internet usage in cultures that do not use the US-ASCII character set, the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) standard was adopted in 2003 to support the inclusion of Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range. 不過，名稱伺服器和網域名稱解析繼續依賴 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的字元。However, name servers and domain name resolution continue to rely on characters within the US-ASCII character range. IDNA 機制會使用 Punycode，來將包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍，網域名稱系統所支援的 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元的國際化的網域名稱對應。The IDNA mechanism uses Punycode to map an internationalized domain name that contains Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to the US-ASCII character range supported by the domain name system. IDNA 機制用來只將網域名稱轉換，不透過網際網路傳輸的資料。The IDNA mechanism is used to convert only domain names, not data transmitted over the Internet. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: > > - 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的 IDNA 標準所述[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > - 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). > > 請參閱[Unicode 技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)這些標準的差異的方式處理特定集的字元。See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters. 方法將正規化的網域名稱，將標準化的名稱轉換成 US-ASCII 字碼指標範圍 (U + 0020 到 U + 007E)，在可顯示的 Unicode 字元所組成，前面加上了 ASCII 相容編碼 (ACE) 的前置詞的表示法 ("xn-」) 給每個標籤。The method normalizes a domain name, converts the normalized name to a representation that consists of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII code point range (U+0020 to U+007E), and prepends an ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE) prefix ("xn--") to each label. 方法會將還原的網域名稱標籤，來轉換方法。The method restores the domain name labels converted by the method. 如果要轉換的字串包含標籤分隔符號字元表意字元句點 (U + 3002)，全形句點 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意字元完全停止 (U + FF61)方法將它們轉換成標籤分隔符號完全停止 （句號，U +002E)。If the string to be converted includes the label separator characters IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61), the method converts them to the label separator FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 方法，不過，不會還原原始的標籤分隔符號字元。The method, however, does not restore the original label separator character. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將陣列轉換國際化網域名稱為 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法再回到原始的網域名稱，會將轉換的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔符號以取代原始的標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back to the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公用方法是安全執行緒，而且用於同時從多個執行緒，因此只要執行個體的屬性不也同時設定。

span.span: All public methods of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, as long as the instance's properties are not also set concurrently.

MemberSignature.Value: public IdnMapping ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: IdnMapping();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並屬性會初始化為`false`。The and properties are initialized to `false`. 一小部分 ASCII 字元 A-Z、 0-9、 連字號 （-） 以外的字元 (U + 002D)，和網域名稱中允許的句號 （.） 字元，但未指派的 Unicode 字碼指標不是。A small subset of ASCII characters other than A-Z, 0-9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character are permitted in domain names, but unassigned Unicode code points are not.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowUnassigned { get; set; }
.property instance bool AllowUnassigned
Public Property AllowUnassigned As Boolean
public: property bool AllowUnassigned { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowUnassigned : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出目前 物件成員執行的作業中是否使用未指定的 Unicode 字碼指標。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果作業中使用未指定的字碼指標則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if unassigned code points are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已註冊的網域名稱不能包含未指派的字碼指標。A registered domain name cannot contain unassigned code points. 因此，預設值屬性是`false`。Consequently, the default value of the property is `false`. IDNA 規格進行比對字串的查詢中只允許未指派的字碼指標 (也就是在網域名稱查閱)。The IDNA specification permits unassigned code points only in queries for matching strings (that is, in domain name lookup). 如需有關使用的網域名稱中的未指派的字碼指標，請參閱[RFC 3454、 「 準備的國際化字串 (stringprep) 」](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873)和[RFC 5891、"國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 （IDNA): 通訊協定 」](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。For more information about the use of unassigned code points in domain names, see [RFC 3454, "Preparation of Internationalized Strings (stringprep)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) and [RFC 5891, "Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性是`false`，與屬性相關聯的行為取決於基礎作業系統。If the property is `false`, the behavior associated with the property depends on the underlying operating system. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，則類別符合 IDNA 2008，它以 Unicode 6.0 標準為基礎。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], the class conforms to IDNA 2008, which is based on the Unicode 6.0 standard. 在舊版 Windows 中，類別根據 IDNA 2003，這根據 Unicode 3。*x*。On previous versions of Windows, the class is based on IDNA 2003, which is based on Unicode 3.*x*. 已指派 IDNA 2003 中的一些字碼指標已指派的字元，而且支援 IDNA 2008。Some code points that were unassigned in IDNA 2003 have been assigned characters and are supported in IDNA 2008. 例如，U + 0221年中引進了 Unicode 4.0。For example, U+0221 was introduced in Unicode 4.0. 上[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它會編碼為 「 xn-6la"。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it is encoded as "xn—6la". 在舊版 Windows 中，就會擲回例外狀況。On previous versions of Windows, it throws an exception.

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

span.span: if the object specified by the parameter is derived from and its and properties are equal; otherwise, .

summary.span: 將包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤字串，編碼為 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示之 Unicode 字元的字串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E).

summary.span: 此字串是依據 IDNA 標準來格式化。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode);
member this.GetAscii : string -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

summary.span: 將網域名稱標籤的字串 (包含 Unicode 字元) 編碼為 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元字串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that consist of Unicode characters to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 此字串是依據 IDNA 標準來格式化。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 參數指定的字串的對等用法，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the string specified by the parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`參數指定有效的 Unicode 字元組成的一或多個標籤的字串。The `unicode` parameter specifies a string of one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以標籤分隔符號分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. `unicode`參數不能以標籤分隔符號，開頭，但它可以包含，並選擇性地以分隔符號為結尾。The `unicode` parameter cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，全形句點 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意字元完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱"www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，"和"com"，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 u+0000 0001 U + 001F 和 U + 007F Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 如果未指定 Unicode 字元的值屬性是`false`。Unassigned Unicode characters, if the value of the property is `false`. - 非標準字元，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空間 (u+0020)，驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，且如果低列 (U + 005F) 字元的值屬性是`true`。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, if the value of the property is `true`. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需有關禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`不包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將陣列轉換國際化網域名稱為 Punycode，這是包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元編碼同等權限。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法再將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔符號以取代原始的標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 根據 和 屬性以及 IDNA 標準， 無效。

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: -當上執行[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的 IDNA 標準所述[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -當在舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行，它會支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 請參閱[Unicode 技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)這些標準的差異的方式處理特定集的字元。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index);
member this.GetAscii : string * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: 針對 以零為起始的位移，指定要轉換的子字串起點。

span.span: A zero-based offset into that specifies the start of the substring to convert.

param.span: 轉換作業會持續到 字串尾端。

span.span: The conversion operation continues to the end of the string.

summary.span: 將包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤子字串編碼。

span.span: Encodes a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子字串會轉換成 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 和 參數指定的子字串的對等用法，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`和`index`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元組成的一或多個標籤子字串。The `unicode` and `index` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以標籤分隔符號分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔符號，開頭，但它可以包含，並選擇性地以分隔符號為結尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，全形句點 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意字元完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱"www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，"和"com"，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 u+0000 0001 U + 001F 和 U + 007F Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元屬性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非標準字元，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空間 (u+0020)，驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值屬性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需有關禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`不包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會移除本機部分和 @ 字元從電子郵件地址，並傳遞產生的網域名稱來方法來建立包含 US-ASCII 字元編碼對等的 Punycode 網域名稱字元範圍。The following example removes the local part and the @ character from an email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the method to create a Punycode domain name, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法再將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔符號以取代原始的標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1a.vb#2)]

is less than zero.

is greater than the length of .

exception.span: 根據 和 屬性以及 IDNA 標準， 無效。

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: -當上執行[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的 IDNA 標準所述[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -當在舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行，它會支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 請參閱[Unicode 技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)這些標準的差異的方式處理特定集的字元。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer, count As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index, int count);
member this.GetAscii : string * int * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: 針對 以零起始的位移，指定子字串起點。

span.span: A zero-based offset into that specifies the start of the substring.

param.name: count
param.span: 子字串中要轉換的字元數，此子字串從 字串中的 所指定的位置開始。

span.span: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by in the string.

summary.span: 在包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤子字串中，將指定數目的字元編碼。

span.span: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子字串會轉換成 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 、 和 參數指定的子字串對等用法，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the , , and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Unicode`， `index`，和`count`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元組成的一或多個標籤子字串。The `Unicode`, `index`, and `count` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以標籤分隔符號分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔符號，開頭，但它可以包含，並選擇性地以分隔符號為結尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，全形句點 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意字元完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱"www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，"和"com"，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 u+0000 0001 U + 001F 和 U + 007F Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元屬性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非標準字元，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空間 (u+0020)，驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值屬性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需有關禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果子字串不包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的任何字元，並禁止使用 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回未變更的子字串。If the substring contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range, and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns the substring unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來轉換 IDNA 標準符合的網域名稱使用國際化的網域名稱。The following example uses the method to convert an internationalized domain name to a domain name that complies with the IDNA standard. 方法，然後將標準化的網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔符號以取代原始的標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the standardized domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/CS/getx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/VB/getx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetHashCode ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer
public: override int GetHashCode();
override this.GetHashCode : unit -> int

summary.span: 傳回這個 物件的雜湊程式碼。

span.span: Returns a hash code for this object.

returns.span: 四個 32 位元帶正負號的常數的其中一個，這些常數是從 物件的屬性衍生。

span.span: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an object.

returns.span: 傳回值沒有特別意義，且不適合在雜湊程式碼演算法中使用。

span.span: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，如果您的應用程式必須實作有意義的雜湊程式碼演算法。Override the method if your application needs to implement a meaningful hash code algorithm. ## Examples 下列範例會假設為單一字串可以包含多個以空格分隔的電子郵件地址。The following example assumes that a single string can contain multiple email addresses separated by spaces. 它會移除本機部分和 @ 字元從每個電子郵件地址，並將產生的網域名稱來或方法用來建立的 Punycode 網域名稱。It removes the local part and the @ character from each email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the or method to create a Punycode domain name. 方法接著會將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1b.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1b.vb#3)]

summary.span: 將一個或多個根據 IDNA 標準編碼的網域名稱標籤解碼為 Unicode 字元的字串。

span.span: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetUnicode (string ascii);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetUnicode(string ascii) cil managed
Public Function GetUnicode (ascii As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetUnicode(System::String ^ ascii);
member this.GetUnicode : string -> string

param.name: ascii
param.span: 要解碼的字串，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中一個或多個標籤，根據 IDNA 標準編碼。

span.span: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.

summary.span: 將根據 IDNA 標準編碼的一個或多個網域名稱標籤字串解碼為 Unicode 字元字串。

span.span: Decodes a string of one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.

returns.span: IDNA 子字串的 Unicode 對等用法，由 參數指定。

span.span: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需網域名稱、 標籤和標籤分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 >方法。For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將陣列轉換國際化網域名稱為 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法再將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔符號以取代原始的標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出目前 物件成員執行的作業中是否使用標準或寬鬆命名慣例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果作業中使用標準命名慣例，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if standard naming conventions are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請遵循標準的命名規則的網域名稱是由 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元的特定子集所組成。Domain names that follow standard naming rules consist of a specific subset of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 字元是字母 A 到 Z、 0 到 9 的數字、 連字號 （-） 字元 (U + 002D)，以及句號 （.） 字元。The characters are the letters A through Z, the digits 0 through 9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character. 字元的大小寫不重要。The case of the characters is not significant. 比較不嚴謹的命名慣例允許使用更廣泛範圍的 ASCII 字元，包括空格字元 (u+0020)、 驚嘆號字元 (U + 0021)，和上方橫線字元 (U + 005F)。Relaxed naming conventions allow the use of a broader range of ASCII characters, including the space character (U+0020), the exclamation point character (U+0021), and the underbar character (U+005F). 如果已`true`，標準的字元可以出現在所傳回的標籤方法。If is `true`, only standard characters can appear in a label returned by the method. 根據預設，windows 7屬性是`false`，以及擴充的 ASCII 字元子集允許在標籤中。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and an expanded subset of ASCII characters is permitted in a label. > [!NOTE] > 類別會禁止使用雙位元字元 u+0000 到 U + 001F，，和 U + 007F 的網域名稱標籤不論設定為何屬性。The class prohibits the use of the nondisplayable characters U+0000 through U+001F, and U+007F in domain name labels regardless of the setting of the property. 這項限制可降低受到安全性攻擊，例如詐騙的風險。This prohibition reduces the risk of security attacks such as name spoofing. ## Examples 下列範例會產生包含在 u+0000 到 U + 007F ASCII 範圍內的字元的 Url，並將它們傳遞至兩個方法物件。The following example generates URLs that contain characters in the ASCII range from U+0000 to U+007F and passes them to the method of two objects. 一個物件都有其屬性設定為`true`，和另一個物件都有設為`false`。One object has its property set to `true`, and the other object has it set to `false`. 輸出會顯示時，都會在無效的字元屬性是`true`時，但有效`false`。The output displays the characters that are invalid when the property is `true` but valid when it is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/cs/usestd3asciirules1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/vb/usestd3asciirules1.vb#1)]
